section.title: Download and Install
section.para: This appendix shows where to get further documentation and how to install the software.

section.title: Debian/Ubuntu Linux
section.para:
You may install crystal-facet-uml by the following command:
sudo apt install crystal-facet-uml

If you instead manually download the .deb archive, you may e.g. invoke sudo dpkg --install <filename.deb> .
Find the latest executable version of crystal-facet-uml at:

section.title: SuSE Linux
section.para:
To install, type on the command line:
sudo zypper addrepo https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/devel:/tools/15.5 devel_tools_15.5 # or sudo zypper addrepo https://download.opensuse.org/repositories/devel:/tools/15.4 devel_tools_15.4 sudo zypper refresh sudo zypper install crystal-facet-uml

If you instead manually download the .rpm archive, you may e.g. invoke sudo zypper install <filename.rpm> .
Check for rpm packages at:
